main event: A captain from the USAF reported sighting a large, brilliant white object with red-orange exhaust while flying near Niagara Falls, New York, on December 6, 1951.
interesting points: The object was 100 ft in diameter and had a pulsating red-orange exhaust trail extending 2 to 3 miles., The sighting lasted approximately 15 seconds and the object was estimated to be traveling at 2,000 mph., The pilot noted that the object made no associated sound., The object appeared to climb at a steep angle and had a blinking light at the top., Weather conditions at the time reported broken clouds and good visibility.
sighted object: large white brilliant object with red-orange exhaust
